comments.comment: Obathumanla gath theerana wenuwen api ithama sathutu wenawa wageama, thamunaanselage awanka bawath pakshayata thibena aadharaya ha dhadi kapa kireemak karupu aya washayenuth obathumanlawa, oya pakshaye leakam Ponna Dayasiri obalaata dhrohikam kara. Wandhuurata mal maalayak dhunna wagey thamai Dhayasirith. Oluwa idhimila pakshaya saamaajikayanta awamaanayak janadhipathi Maithripala sirisena mahathata koka pennala, ey pamanak novai, oba thumanlage pakshaya dhekada karala pakshaya diyaveemata maga paadhuwa. Pakshaya ohuge amma appage boodhalayak kiyala hithagena innawa.  ohuta hitha yatin thibune pohottuwata paninna. Wadi kal nogos pakshayata aadhara karana janathaawa ohuta hondha paadamak uganwana baha sahathikai. Maha parlimenthu chandhayedhi ohuge amathi kama paraajaya karala ohuwa prathikshepa karala gedahara yawanna kiya illami. Mamath ohu U.N.P. ye inna kaale ohuta chandhaya dhunna. Ohuta gaurawayak ha aadharadha thibuna, passe ohu apiwath paawa dheela Mahindha samanga ekathu wuna. Ay dawaswala ohu gana dhadi koapayak ha kalakireemak athi wuna. Thaamath ohu gana eay vidhiyamai. Gembek wagey  pakshayen pakshayata pana pana ohuta prathipaththiyak naha. Eka kaaledhi U.N.P. ya paawadunna. Passe dhan Srilanka nidhahas pakshayath paawa dhunna. Mey wagey dheshapalakayan panna dhamanna. Kanagatui Maithripala sirisena mahathata wenama janadhipathi tharangayata idhiripath wenna awasthawa thibunath ay thuma idhiripath novi pasu bassa. Oba thumanlath kaalaya apathe hariya, Maithripala sirisena mahathatawa Janadhipathi lesa tharanga karanna unandhu karanna thibuna awasthawa maga hariyah. Obathumanlata wishesha isthuthiy  hansayata enam Sajith Premadasata  udhaw karala Sajith mahathmayawa dhinawanna hamoma kamaththa pala kireema gana aseemen obathumanlaata maage pranamaya. Devi pihitai.
comments.author: Mohammed Muzaahir

comments.comment: Kakistocracy that has enslaved this country past 71 years. Minority of 225+1 dominating 22million its really a great joke and shame on us, cos still we have been deceived by the 225+1. I cant understand even the intelectuals, genius and maestros not opening their eyes to overcome what our country currently facing today. Its not all about a person what we need is a real drastic system change. So my dear fellow Srilankans please wake up and be very vigilant, wise and be smart. This is our last opportunity to overcome all our obstacles and barriers. So please dont stuck in a rut come out of the box and start thinking wisely to have a better place in our beautiful motherland.Therefore we all stand together to restore our beautiful motherland to a first world paradise.
comments.author: Modern world
